description.value: When the character inflicts Righteous Fury with an Attack or Psychic Power that they achieved 3+ Degrees of Success on the Test for, they roll twice to etermine the amount of Critical damage inflicted with Righteous Fury, and take the higher result.

system.benefit: When the character inflicts Righteous Fury with an Attack or Psychic Power that they achieved 3+ Degrees of Success on the Test for, they roll twice to etermine the amount of Critical damage inflicted with Righteous Fury, and take the higher result.
